alert.note: Alert for Eastern Dutchess; Eastern Ulster; Western Dutchess (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 14 at 11:49PM EDT until March 15 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM EDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of a dusting to two inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...In Connecticut, Southern Litchfield County. In New York, Eastern Ulster, Western Dutchess and Eastern Dutchess Counties. * WHEN...Until 8 AM EDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The weight of the wet snow on tree branches may result in some power outages.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Dutchess; Eastern Ulster; Western Dutchess
